group_1.textLeft: Alright, next,
we'll do the scene where Ui gets some tutoring.

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look like Tsuruno's here yet...
Oh yeah, about that...

group_1.textLeft: Is everything ready to go, Yachiyo?

group_1.textRight: No, not yet. And as for Tsuruno,
when Felicia called her earlier,
it turns out they're very busy, given it's lunch and@just after reopening. We should've expected that.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, today's the first business day of the@new year...

group_1.textRight: They joked that they made a grave miscalculation@in letting Felicia take the day off.

group_1.textLeft: Well...that's a good reason as any to not be@able to come.

group_1.textRight: So Tsuruno won't be here until after 2.

group_1.textLeft: Oh well, I guess there's nothing we can do@about it.
Why don't we tackle the scene where we're@all playing together?
Oh, wait… Tsuruno is going to appear in that@part, too.
Let's hold off until she arrives.

group_1.textRight: We'll just be wasting our time until then,@though.
Someone should take Tsuruno's place and@help Ui study.

group_1.textLeft: I think Felicia can handle it.

group_1.textRight: I can do fifth grade stuff no problem!
Oh, I can help out in secret...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much!
...Right, we have to try all our options first.

group_1.textRight: You have a script, right?@Then this'll be a piece of cake!

group_1.textLeft: Everyone in Mikazuki is so reliable!
They even teach Ui how to study!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Felicia, I don't understand this part...

group_1.textRight: That's your winter break homework?@I'll handle this!

group_1.textLeft: It's asking me to find the area of the triangle@"ABC"...

group_1.textRight: Easy peasy! Let's see...

group_1.textCenter: In the script, it should be...right here.

group_1.textRight: Aha!
...So, it turns out this triangle...
...is the same height as this other one, "DBC."
...Hey, Ui, what's this say?

group_1.textLeft: It says..."the bottom–"

group_1.textRight: The bottom! You start from the bottom@of the whole rectangle, and–

group_1.textLeft: Cut.

group_1.textRight: Hey! What'd I do?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't think you should be asking Ui for@help, here...

group_1.textRight: I should've realized you guys were stuck...

group_1.textLeft: L-let's try again one more time!

group_1.textCenter: Okay, everyone, back in your positions...

group_1.textRight: Sorry I'm laaaate–!
What's up, guys?@How's the recording been?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Tsuruno, you came in the nick of time!
So, uh...speaking of recording...
Everyone, please listen carefully...

group_1.textRight: What is it, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100153:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100153:motion_400][chara:100153:cheek_0][chara:100153:face_mtn_ex_060.exp.json][chara:100153:lipSynch_1]All of the videos we've taken so far...@aren't any good!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, all of them?!
L-let's take a look at them, first...
E-everyone's worked so hard in these...!
We all want Iroha and Ui's parents to feel@reassured...so we've been doing our best...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Sana.
But it's clear things have gotten out of hand.

group_1.textRight: This is harder than I thought...
Yeah, I know what you mean...

group_1.textLeft: I think...
When it comes to the Mikazuki I want to show@our parents...
I don't want us to be on a script.

group_1.textRight: I want to introduce everyone...
...and have us just be our usual selves.

group_1.textLeft: Ui...you're exactly right.
There's no point in us pretending to be perfect.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100250:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
I want...I want them to know you guys as@you really are.
